shortDefinition: Gross domestic product of an economy
description: A measure of the total value of goods and services produced by an economy.

The total domestic and foreign income of residents of a country. Consists of gross domestic product (GDP) plus incomes earned by foreign residents, minus income earned in the domestic economy by nonresidents.
Any land capable of being ploughed and used to grow crops
A sustained increase in the general level of prices for goods and services
